policy_text: PTO Policy: Employees with 0 to 24 months of tenure are allocated 40 hours of PTO per year.
PTO Policy: Employees with 25 to 60 months of tenure are allocated 80 hours of PTO per year.
PTO Policy: Employees with 61 to 120 months of tenure are allocated 120 hours of PTO per year.
PTO Policy: Employees with 121 or more years of tenure are allocated 160 hours of PTO per year.
Holiday Policy: All employees receive 104 hours paid holidays per year.
Sick Leave Policy: All employees are allocated 40 hours of paid sick leave per year.
Paternity Leave Policy: All employees are allocated 40 hours of paternity leave.
Maternity Leave Policy: All employees are allocated 80 hours of maternity leave.
